comment.author: 56758795@N05
comment._content: The image is reversed. North Street in the background rises to the right, not the left. Nice historical image though, just mirrored :)

comment.author: 54403180@N04
comment._content: Thanks for your comment finnmac1953. We have now replaced the reversed image with one showing the correct orientation.
comment.authorname: Public Record Office of Northern Ireland

comment.author: 56758795@N05
comment._content: It's a beautiful image. I can remember swimming there in the harbour as a boy. What a terrible shame the Moyle Council spoiled it with the marina
